subject: Re: Any insight on my life changing EVP experience?
author: chuck255
full_text:
Maybe your right :) Who is craziest though...the crazy person or the 
person that stays with the crazy person?  

I will add that she knew about them and I told her about them before I 
asked her to leave. Besides the gadgets weren't strictly for her, they 
were for the weirdness at the new apartment. But thanks for the shallow 
help.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, black bear hollow <blackbearhollow@...> 
wrote:
>
> It sounds like you seriously need some professional help. Anyone who  
> would not only stay with someone like you describe, but go to the  
> length you have with spying has some serious issues that no one on  
> this list can advise you with. My suggestion, and I'm extremely  
> serious, is that you get some professional psychological help and 
quick.
> 
> w.
> On Dec 3, 2008, at 2:46 PM, chuck255 wrote:
> 
> >  I am new to this
> > stuff and will just stay away from it now, but some kind of insight
> > would be great.
>
